docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Looking for self-motivated students

I’m looking for self-motivated Ph.D./Master/Undergraduate students to work with me. If you are interested in my research, feel free to contact me.

docs.title: About
docs.text: I am an associate professor at School of Computer Science and Technology, Xi'an Jiaotong University. I received my B.E. degree from Xi'an Jiaotong University in 2013, and Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University in 2018.
